item.title: JSLT
item.description: I’ve a GraphQL service and a Spring Boot application. The latter consumes the former. In the application, I transform the retrieved JSON with the help of JSLT. Today, I wrote a JSLT program to do de-duplication and array intersection. Below is the context: My GraphQL query: query MyQuery(...) { arrayA: someModel(...) { someInnerModel { id } }, arrayB: someModel(...) { someInnerModel { id } } } Expected JSON response from GraphQL service:
